parts.text:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>Subject: Referral of Unresolved Customer Grievances for Investigation

Dear [Recipient Name/Department Name],

This memo formally refers the following unresolved customer grievances to your department for further investigation and resolution. We have exhausted our initial customer service protocols and require your specialized expertise to address these complex issues.

Please find attached the detailed case files for each grievance, including:

*   Customer contact information
*   A summary of the customer's complaint
*   A record of all previous interactions with our customer service team
*   Relevant documentation (e.g., invoices, contracts, correspondence)

The specific case file numbers being referred are:

*   [Case File Number 1]
*   [Case File Number 2]
*   [Case File Number 3]
*   [And so on, listing all case file numbers]

We kindly request that your department prioritize these cases and provide us with an estimated timeframe for resolution. Regular updates on the progress of the investigations would be greatly appreciated.

Please direct any questions or requests for additional information to [Your Name] at [Your Phone Number] or [Your Email Address].

Thank you for your prompt attention to these important matters. We are confident that your expertise will lead to satisfactory resolutions for our valued customers.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]

Senior Customer Service Representative
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
